Box Geometry Computation

These classes compute the intersections for various box geometries types, such as cell, face, node, and outerface. The results of these intersections are used by the communication routines in the generation of communication schedules.
  • SAMRAI::pdat::CellGeometry
  • SAMRAI::pdat::CellOverlap
